rules_text:
Flying
[i]Killer Lance [/i]– Whenever Cormag, Aloof Lanceman becomes blocked, he gets +2/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.
[i]Crit[/i] – Whenever Cormag, Aloof Lanceman, deals combat damage to a player, you may search your library for a land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand.
